title: Mountain Skies
description: This art was inspired by a mountain landscape picture taken by Michael Gabriel, I really liked the sky in this picture, and I wanted to see what I could do with it.
tools: I used PixieEditor to create my pixel art!

title: The Voyage of Eärendil the Mariner
description:
Eärendil was a mariner
that tarried in Arvernien;
he built a boat of timber felled
in Nimbrethil to journey in;
her sails he wove of silver fair,
of silver were her lanterns made,
her prow was fashioned like a swan,
and light upon her banners laid.

title: EXP Grinding
description: A Pokémon trainer is training their Charmander on wild Caterpie in Veridian Forest.

title: Stroll through the BeanBean Fields
description: This picture is based on the game Mario and Luigi SuperStar Saga. I made the background myself and altered 8 bit sprites to create my own sprites in reference to the other games in the series. Mario and Luigi by Nintendo, hopefully no trouble for this.

title: Pipe of Bubbles
description: A jolly roger smoking a pipe of bubbles

title: Ultimate FANAF Pixel Mashup
description: This pixel art features many of the most famous FNAF characters all revolving around the scene of the bite of 87. Credit: My art is based off characters from the FNAF series.

title: Scooby Doo
tools: Divoom on IOS and resize.com to resize

title: beach sunset
description: This pixel art resembles a sunset over the ocean.

title: Red Sox Logo
description: Pixel Art rendition of Boston Red Sox logo.
tools: Divoom for art and ImaginaryCat for scaling
